segments.text: Tom , we are in the restaurant now !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to see the menu , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I am starving . Tom , what are you getting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . First time here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see ... What's this , shrimp rolls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's rice rolls with fried shrimp inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Twenty five yuan is a little expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are twenty rolls in a bowl . You can get another bowl for free if there aren't enough rolls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds nice . We will take this , two bowls of shrimp rolls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , shrimp rolls . Do you want anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will have this one first and order something else later .
segments.speaker: S1
